title: Dead Woman Insists On 'Wizard Of Oz' Obit
teaser: Joanna Scarpitti loved that movie so much that she made her daughter promise that when she died that a famous line would be used in her obituary. Scarpitti's obit began: "Ding dong the witch is dead."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
